title.rendered: Men`s California Splashes Solid Knit Gloves

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1483452298458{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Don`t let the weather keep you from the game or your tech when you have these California Splashes solid knit gloves.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Material: 83% Acrylic/12% Polyester/2% Rubber/2% Elastane/1% Metallic
  • Texting Tips: Touch screen compatibility allows use of smartphones, tablets, and touch devices without removing gloves
  • Contrasting colors
  • Embroidered fabric applique

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][stm_icon_list list_type=”font” title=”fa fa-check”]

  • Hand wash, dry flat
  • Officially licensed
  • Imported
  • Brand: Forever Collectibles

[/stm_icon_list][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Don`t let the weather keep you from the game or your tech when you have these California Splashes solid knit gloves.
